Developers can now use Dependabot to automatically keep their Julia dependencies up to date. For projects that use Julia as a package manager, Dependabot version updates can now ensure dependenciesâ€¦

The post [Dependabot version updates now support Julia](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-12-16-dependabot-version-updates-now-support-julia) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
Author: Allison
EnhancedContent:
Developers can now use Dependabot to automatically keep their Julia dependencies up to date. For projects that use Julia as a package manager, Dependabot version updates can now ensure dependencies stay current with the latest releases.

- Engage with [the Dependabot open source community](https://github.com/dependabot/dependabot-core/issues/2105) on the topic of Julia support.
- Learn more in [our Dependabot version updates documentation](https://docs.github.com/code-security/dependabot/dependabot-version-updates/about-dependabot-version-updates).
- Learn more about [Julia](https://julialang.org/).
Title: Dependabot version updates now support Julia
